Posted By: Mprime818 (9/10/2009 2:26:57 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: Right now the only playably deck that can use this guy would be one that utilizes together the other M10 vampires and [Chameleon Colossus](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Chameleon Colossus). Of course such a deck would need [Twilight Mire](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Twilight Mire) but it could also use [Maelstrom Pulse](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Maelstrom Pulse) and [Garruk Wildspeaker](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Garruk Wildspeaker) for extra strength. Hopefully by october when Zendikar comes out there will be a few new vampires to justify a vampire tribal deck.
posts.html:

Posted By: ZioKai (9/8/2009 11:06:53 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: This card does have some draw backs, but I run a monoblack and do not seem to have much problems with it. If you run into a nonblack card on top of your library then cards like Diabolic Tutor and Ad Nauseam can change that. I find it much easier to run a Vampire decck with 12 Vampires and a few other creatures to keep it rough for the opponent. Also, if you are tired of being hit with spells left and right then Nocturnus is a great enough creature to take the heat for you. :)
posts.html:
